testcase.name: should call BluetoothGatt.readDescriptor() only once on single read when run()
asObservable() should not emit error when BluetoothGatt.readDescriptor() returns true while run()
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.readDescriptor() returns false while run()
asObservable() should emit error when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorRead() emits error
asObservable() should not emit when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorRead() emits before run()
asObservable() should emit next when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorRead() emits next
asObservable() emit only first descriptor value notified
asObservable() not emit descriptor value if BLE notified only with non matching descriptors
asObservable() emit only descriptor value for matching descriptor
should release QueueReleaseInterface after successful read
should release QueueReleaseInterface when read failed to start
should release QueueReleaseInterface when read failed
should timeout if RxBleGattCallback.onDescriptorRead() won't trigger in 30 seconds
